c.description: Minimize makespan subject to the given constraints on what changes can be made to the line.

cycle_time.description: Definition of the cycle time limit (note that production volume is inversely proportional to cycle time).

a.description: Do not change this parameters compared to the reference value, as the scenario does not require any modification to the cycle time limit.

c.description: Update the initial configuration by removing resource ${resource_index} from cell ${cell_index} in the ${parameter_name} array, as this resource is unavailable due to failure or absence. This requires changing the appropriate element of a matrix (one of InitBuilt, InitTool, InitStorage, InitRobot, InitHuman denoted by ${parameter_name}) from 1 to 0. All other resources remain available.

modification_of_stations.description: Determine whether stations can be modified compared to the initial configuration or not.

b.description: Prohibit any modification to the stations, as such a change would cause excessive downtime and disrupt production.

modification_of_robots.description: Determine whether robots can be modified compared to the initial configuration or not.

b.description: Prohibit any modification to the robots, as such a change would cause excessive downtime and disrupt production.

modification_of_tools.description: Determine whether tools can be modified compared to the initial configuration or not.

c.description: Allow the optimization engine to modify tools arbitrarily, as these minor adjustments can be promptly applied.

modification_of_storages.description: Determine whether storages can be modified compared to the initial configuration or not.

c.description: Allow the optimization engine to modify storages arbitrarily, as these minor adjustments can be promptly applied.

modification_of_humans.description: Determine whether the allocation of human workers can be modified compared to the initial configuration or not.

b.description: Prohibit any modification to the allocation of human workers.

modification_of_tasks.description: Definition of tasks in the process plan.

a.description: Do not change these parameters compared to the reference value, as the scenario does not require any modification to products or the process plans.
